text: Xinbeitou is a metro station on the Xinbeitou branch line of the Tamsui-Xinyi Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code is R22A. == Station layout information == The station platforms are above ground level. Both Platforms 1 and 2 are for Beitou, but Platform 2 is a backup platform. Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Xinbeitou metro station
